00001 ///@file SMTP.c
00002 ///@brief All things Email

00016 /// Text values of config option 'when to send emails'
00017 static ROM char *WhenToSendEmailText[] =
00018         {
00019                 "No Emails",
00020                 "Latchkey Only",
00021                 "Inital Alarm",
00022                 "All Alarms",
00023                 "Every Event"
00024         };
00025 
00026 /// State machine for sending out emails
00027 SMTPTaskLists SMTPTaskList;
00028 
00029 /// testing email
00030 int SMPTTestResult;

00037 //*****************************************************************************
00038 /// Prints who the email is addressed to
00039 void HTTPPrint_SMTP_To (void) {
00040 
00041         // Set a flag to indicate not finished
00042         curHTTP.callbackPos = 1;
00043 
00044         // Make sure there's enough output space
00045         if(TCPIsPutReady(sktHTTP) < sizeof(xPLConfig.SMTP_To))
00046                 return;
00047 
00048         TCPPutArray(sktHTTP, xPLConfig.SMTP_To, strlen(xPLConfig.SMTP_To));
00049 
00050         // Indicate that we're done
00051         curHTTP.callbackPos = 0x00;
00052         return;
00053 }
00054 
00055 //*****************************************************************************
00056 /// Prints the POP3 sever
00057 void HTTPPrint_SMTP_Server (void) {
00058 
00059         // Set a flag to indicate not finished
00060         curHTTP.callbackPos = 1;
00061 
00062         // Make sure there's enough output space
00063         if(TCPIsPutReady(sktHTTP) < sizeof(xPLConfig.SMTP_Server))
00064                 return;
00065 
00066         TCPPutArray(sktHTTP, xPLConfig.SMTP_Server, strlen(xPLConfig.SMTP_Server));
00067 
00068         // Indicate that we're done
00069         curHTTP.callbackPos = 0x00;
00070         return;
00071 }

00084

00106 //*****************************************************************************
00107 /// Port number that the POP3 server runs from
00108 void HTTPPrint_SMTP_Port (void) {
00109 
00110         char Tempdigits[6];
00111 
00112         // Set a flag to indicate not finished
00113         curHTTP.callbackPos = 1;
00114 
00115         // Make sure there's enough output space
00116         if(TCPIsPutReady(sktHTTP) < sizeof(Tempdigits))
00117                 return;
00118 
00119         uitoa(xPLConfig.SMTP_Port,  Tempdigits);
00120         TCPPutArray(sktHTTP, Tempdigits, strlen((char*)Tempdigits));
00121 
00122         // Indicate that we're done
00123         curHTTP.callbackPos = 0x00;
00124         return;
00125 }
00126 /*****************************************************************************
00127 void HTTPPrint_SMTP_UseSSL (void) {
00128 
00129         char Tempdigits[3];
00130 
00131         // Set a flag to indicate not finished
00132         curHTTP.callbackPos = 1;
00133 
00134         // Make sure there's enough output space
00135         if(TCPIsPutReady(sktHTTP) < sizeof(Tempdigits))
00136                 return;
00137 
00138         uitoa(xPLConfig.SMTP_UseSSL,  Tempdigits);
00139         TCPPutArray(sktHTTP, Tempdigits, strlen((char*)Tempdigits));
00140 
00141         // Indicate that we're done
00142         curHTTP.callbackPos = 0x00;
00143         return;
00144 }
00145 */
00146 //*****************************************************************************
00147 /// Prints if email service is active
00148 void HTTPPrint_SMTP_Active (void) {
00149 
00150         TCPPut(sktHTTP, (xPLConfig.SMTP_Active?'1':'0'));
00151         return;
00152 }

00155 void HTTPPrint_SMTP_OnlyInitalAlarm (void) {
00156 
00157         TCPPut(sktHTTP, (xPLConfig.SMTP_OnlyInitalAlarm?'1':'0'));
00158         return;
00159 }

00168 //*****************************************************************************
00169 /// Prnits test data for P0P3 results
00170 void HTTPPrint_SMTPTestOutput (void) {
00171 
00172 
00173 
00174         char Tempdigits[6];
00175 
00176         // Set a flag to indicate not finished
00177         curHTTP.callbackPos = 1;
00178 
00179         // Make sure there's enough output space
00180         if(TCPIsPutReady(sktHTTP) < 17)
00181                 return;
00182 
00183         if (SMPTTestResult == SMTP_SUCCESS)
00184                 TCPPutROMString(sktHTTP, (ROM BYTE*)"Successful");
00185         else if (SMPTTestResult == SMTP_RESOLVE_ERROR)
00186                 TCPPutROMString(sktHTTP, (ROM BYTE*)"DNS error");
00187         else if (SMPTTestResult == SMTP_CONNECT_ERROR)
00188                 TCPPutROMString(sktHTTP, (ROM BYTE*)"Connection error");
00189         else if (SMPTTestResult == 554)
00190                 TCPPutROMString(sktHTTP, (ROM BYTE*)"Transaction failed");              
00191         else if (SMPTTestResult == 550)
00192                 TCPPutROMString(sktHTTP, (ROM BYTE*)"Requested action not taken: mailbox unavailable");
00193     else if (SMPTTestResult == 552)
00194                 TCPPutROMString(sktHTTP, (ROM BYTE*)"Requested mail action aborted: exceeded storage allocation");              
00195     else if (SMPTTestResult == 553)
00196                 TCPPutROMString(sktHTTP, (ROM BYTE*)"Requested action not taken: mailbox name not allowed");            
00197     else if (SMPTTestResult == 530)
00198                 TCPPutROMString(sktHTTP, (ROM BYTE*)"Access denied");           
00199     else if (SMPTTestResult == 535)
00200                 TCPPutROMString(sktHTTP, (ROM BYTE*)"SMTP Authentication unsuccessful/Bad username or password");       
00201                 
00202         else {
00203                 uitoa(SMPTTestResult,  Tempdigits);
00204                 TCPPutROMString(sktHTTP, (ROM BYTE*)"Error# ");
00205                 TCPPutArray(sktHTTP, Tempdigits, strlen((char*)Tempdigits));
00206         }
00207 
00208         // Indicate that we're done
00209         curHTTP.callbackPos = 0x00;
00210         SMPTTestResult = SMTP_TEST_DONE;
00211 
00212         return;
00213 
00214 }

00218 /*********************************************************************
00219   Function:        HTTPPostSMTPConfig
00220   PreCondition:    curHTTP is loaded
00221   Input:           None
00222   Output:          HTTP_IO_DONE on success, HTTP_IO_NEED_DATA if more data is requested
00223   Side Effects:    None
00224   Overview:
00225  ********************************************************************/
00226 ///     This function reads an input parameter from the POSTed data, and writes that string to the configuration values for SMTP
00227 
00228 HTTP_IO_RESULT HTTPPostSMTPConfig(void) {
00229 
00230     BYTE temp[16];
00231     BYTE *ptr;
00232 
00233     // Define state machine values
00234     #define SM_SMTP_START                       (0u)
00235     #define SM_SMTP_TO                          (1u)
00236     #define SM_SMTP_SERVER                      (2u)
00237     #define SM_SMTP_USER                        (3u)
00238     #define SM_SMTP_PASSWORD            (4u)
00239     #define SM_SMTP_PORT                        (5u)
00240     #define SM_SMTP_SSL                         (6u)
00241     #define SM_SMTP_ACTIVE                      (7u)
00242     #define SM_SMTP_INITALALARM         (8u)
00243     #define SM_SMTP_ARMDISARM           (9u)
00244     #define SM_SMTP_SUCCESS                     (10u)
00245 
00246     switch(curHTTP.smPost)
00247     {
00248         case SM_SMTP_START:
00249             // Read the next variable name.  If a complete name is
00250             // not found, request more data.  This function will
00251             // automatically truncate invalid data to prevent
00252             // buffer overflows.
00253 
00254             if(curHTTP.byteCount == 0) {
00255                                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_SUCCESS;
00256                                 break;
00257                         }
00258 
00259             if(HTTPReadPostName(temp,16) == HTTP_READ_INCOMPLETE)
00260                 return HTTP_IO_NEED_DATA;
00261 
00262             if(!strcmppgm2ram((char*)temp, (ROM char*)"to"))
00263                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_TO;
00264 
00265             else if(!strcmppgm2ram((char*)temp, (ROM char*)"server"))
00266                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_SERVER;
00267 
00268             else if(!strcmppgm2ram((char*)temp, (ROM char*)"user"))
00269                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_USER;
00270 
00271             else if(!strcmppgm2ram((char*)temp, (ROM char*)"pw"))
00272                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_PASSWORD;
00273 
00274             else if(!strcmppgm2ram((char*)temp, (ROM char*)"port"))
00275                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_PORT;
00276 
00277             else if(!strcmppgm2ram((char*)temp, (ROM char*)"ssl"))
00278                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_SSL;
00279 
00280             else if(!strcmppgm2ram((char*)temp, (ROM char*)"active"))
00281                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_ACTIVE;
00282 
00283             else if(!strcmppgm2ram((char*)temp, (ROM char*)"initalarm"))
00284                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_INITALALARM;
00285 
00286             else if(!strcmppgm2ram((char*)temp, (ROM char*)"armdisarm"))
00287                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_ARMDISARM;
00288 
00289 
00290             else {
00291                         // Something has gone wrong
00292                                 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00293                                         putrsUART((ROM char*)" Finished POST early due to unexpected name: ");
00294                                         putsUART(temp);
00295                                         putrsUART((ROM char*)"\r\n");
00296                                 #endif
00297 
00298                         return HTTP_IO_DONE;
00299                         }
00300                 break;
00301 
00302 
00303         case SM_SMTP_TO:
00304             memset(xPLConfig.SMTP_To,'\0',sizeof(xPLConfig.SMTP_To));
00305             if(HTTPReadPostValue(xPLConfig.SMTP_To ,sizeof(xPLConfig.SMTP_To) + 2) == HTTP_READ_INCOMPLETE)
00306                 return HTTP_IO_NEED_DATA;
00307             curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_START; // Return to read a new name
00308             break;
00309 
00310         case SM_SMTP_SERVER:
00311                         memset(xPLConfig.SMTP_Server,'\0',sizeof(xPLConfig.SMTP_Server));
00312                 if(HTTPReadPostValue(xPLConfig.SMTP_Server ,sizeof(xPLConfig.SMTP_Server) + 2 ) == HTTP_READ_INCOMPLETE)
00313                 return HTTP_IO_NEED_DATA;
00314             curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_START; // Return to read a new name
00315             break;
00316 
00317 
00318         case SM_SMTP_USER:
00319                         memset(xPLConfig.SMTP_User,'\0',sizeof(xPLConfig.SMTP_User));
00320                 if(HTTPReadPostValue(xPLConfig.SMTP_User ,sizeof(xPLConfig.SMTP_User) + 2) == HTTP_READ_INCOMPLETE)
00321                 return HTTP_IO_NEED_DATA;
00322             curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_START; // Return to read a new name
00323             break;
00324 
00325         case SM_SMTP_PASSWORD:
00326                 memset(xPLConfig.SMTP_Password,'\0',sizeof(xPLConfig.SMTP_Password));
00327                 if(HTTPReadPostValue(xPLConfig.SMTP_Password ,sizeof(xPLConfig.SMTP_Password) + 2) == HTTP_READ_INCOMPLETE)
00328                 return HTTP_IO_NEED_DATA;
00329             curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_START; // Return to read a new name
00330             break;
00331 
00332         case SM_SMTP_PORT:
00333                 if(HTTPReadPostValue(temp ,sizeof(temp) + 2) == HTTP_READ_INCOMPLETE)
00334                 return HTTP_IO_NEED_DATA;
00335             xPLConfig.SMTP_Port = atoi(temp);
00336                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_START; // Return to read a new name
00337             break;
00338 
00339 /*        case SM_SMTP_SSL:
00340                 if(HTTPReadPostValue(temp ,sizeof(temp)) == HTTP_READ_INCOMPLETE)
00341                 return HTTP_IO_NEED_DATA;
00342             if(temp[0] == '1')
00343                 xPLConfig.SMTP_UseSSL = TRUE;
00344             if(temp[0] == '0')
00345                 xPLConfig.SMTP_UseSSL = FALSE;
00346                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_START; // Return to read a new name
00347             break;
00348  */
00349         case SM_SMTP_ACTIVE:
00350                 if(HTTPReadPostValue(temp ,sizeof(temp) + 2) == HTTP_READ_INCOMPLETE)
00351                 return HTTP_IO_NEED_DATA;
00352             if(temp[0] == '1')
00353                 xPLConfig.SMTP_Active = TRUE;
00354             if(temp[0] == '0')
00355                 xPLConfig.SMTP_Active = FALSE;
00356                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_START; // Return to read a new name
00357             break;
00358 
00359         case SM_SMTP_INITALALARM:
00360                 if(HTTPReadPostValue(temp ,sizeof(temp) + 2) == HTTP_READ_INCOMPLETE)
00361                 return HTTP_IO_NEED_DATA;
00362             if(temp[0] == '1')
00363                 xPLConfig.SMTP_OnlyInitalAlarm = TRUE;
00364             if(temp[0] == '0')
00365                 xPLConfig.SMTP_OnlyInitalAlarm = FALSE;
00366                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_START; // Return to read a new name
00367             break;
00368 
00369 
00370         case SM_SMTP_ARMDISARM:
00371                 if(HTTPReadPostValue(temp ,sizeof(temp) + 2) == HTTP_READ_INCOMPLETE)
00372                 return HTTP_IO_NEED_DATA;
00373             if(temp[0] == '1')
00374                 xPLConfig.SMTP_ArmDisarm = TRUE;
00375             if(temp[0] == '0')
00376                 xPLConfig.SMTP_ArmDisarm = FALSE;
00377                 curHTTP.smPost = SM_SMTP_START; // Return to read a new name
00378         //    break;
00379 
00380                 // The POST is only accepted after the SM_SMTP_ARMDISARM, it will fail if this is missing
00381                 // dont like this design but it should never be an issue
00382 
00383 
00384              case SM_SMTP_SUCCESS:
00385                         #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00386                                 putrsUART((ROM char*)" Finished POST correctly\r\n");
00387                         #endif
00388 
00389                         // now we save all of it
00390                         xPLSaveEEConfig(&xPLConfig, EEDATASTART_XPL, sizeof(xPLConfig));
00391 
00392                 return HTTP_IO_DONE; // we are complete
00393 
00394 
00395     } // switch(curHTTP.smPost)
00396 
00397     return HTTP_IO_WAITING;
00398 
00399 } //  HTTPPostSMTPConfig
00400 
00401 /*********************************************************************
00402   Function:        SMTPTaskProcess
00403   PreCondition:    None
00404   Input:           None
00405   Output:          None
00406   Side Effects:    None
00407   Overview:
00408 
00409  ********************************************************************/
00410 ///     Managers the scheduled sending of emails
00411 
00412 void SMTPTaskProcess(void) {
00413 
00414 #if defined(STACK_USE_SMTP_CLIENT)
00415 
00416 static BYTE RAMStringBody[50];
00417 char DeviceDesc[DEVICEDESCLENGTH];
00418 int ReturnResult;
00419 
00420 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00421         char TempString[4]; // prints the status of the SMTP task machine
00422 #endif
00423 
00424 // Manages the Current Task and keeps it up to date.
00425 if (SMTPTaskList.Task[SMTPTaskList.CurentTask].SMTP_State == SMTP_SM_Done) {
00426         if (SMTPTaskList.FreePosition == SMTPTaskList.CurentTask) {
00427                 return;
00428         }
00429         if (SMTPTaskList.CurentTask < (SMTPSMSIZE-1))
00430                 SMTPTaskList.CurentTask++;
00431         else if(SMTPTaskList.CurentTask >= (SMTPSMSIZE-1))
00432                 SMTPTaskList.CurentTask =0;
00433         return;
00434 }
00435 
00436 //Check to see if emails are active
00437 if (xPLConfig.SMTP_Active == FALSE) {
00438         // Do nothing in this case
00439         #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00440                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"Doing nothing with SMTP task as SMTP is not active\r\n");
00441         #endif
00442         SMTPTaskList.Task[SMTPTaskList.CurentTask].SMTP_State = SMTP_SM_Done;
00443         return;
00444 }
00445 
00446 /*  Sample code
00447         // Increaments the Free position, ready for the next task.
00448         if (SMTPTaskList.FreePosition < (SMTPSMSIZE-1))
00449                 SMTPTaskList.FreePosition++;
00450         else if(SMTPTaskList.FreePosition >= (SMTPSMSIZE-1))
00451                 SMTPTaskList.FreePosition =0;
00452 */
00453 
00454 
00455         switch(SMTPTaskList.Task[SMTPTaskList.CurentTask].SMTP_State ) {
00456 
00457                 case SMTP_SM_InQ:
00458 
00459                         if(SMTPBeginUsage()) {
00460 
00461                                 // Note that these strings must stay allocated in
00462                                 // memory until SMTPIsBusy() returns FALSE.  To
00463                                 // guarantee that the C compiler does not reuse this
00464                                 // memory, you must allocate the strings as static.
00465 
00466                                 memset(RAMStringBody, '\0',50);
00467 
00468                                 SMTPClient.To.szRAM = xPLConfig.SMTP_To;
00469                                 SMTPClient.From.szROM = (ROM BYTE*) "\"Alarm System\" <no-reply@redspartan.com.au>";
00470                                 SMTPClient.ROMPointers.From = 1;
00471                                 SMTPClient.Server.szRAM = xPLConfig.SMTP_Server;
00472                                 SMTPClient.Username.szRAM = xPLConfig.SMTP_User;
00473                                 SMTPClient.Password.szRAM = xPLConfig.SMTP_Password;
00474                                 SMTPClient.ServerPort = xPLConfig.SMTP_Port;
00475                                 //#if defined(STACK_USE_SSL)
00476                                 //      SMTPClient.UseSSL = FALSE; //xPLConfig.SMTP_UseSSL;
00477                                 //#endif
00478 
00479                                 if (SMTPTaskList.Task[SMTPTaskList.CurentTask].SMTP_SendType == SMTP_Test) {
00480                                         SMTPClient.Subject.szROM = (ROM BYTE*)"This is a test email";
00481                                         SMTPClient.ROMPointers.Subject = 1;
00482                                         SMTPClient.Body.szROM = (ROM BYTE*)"If you see this message the test worked\r\nHave a nice day :)\r\n";
00483                                         SMTPClient.ROMPointers.Body = 1;
00484                                 }
00485 
00486                                 else if (SMTPTaskList.Task[SMTPTaskList.CurentTask].SMTP_SendType == SMTP_Arm) {
00487                                         SMTPClient.Subject.szROM = (ROM BYTE*)"System Armed";
00488                                         SMTPClient.ROMPointers.Subject = 1;
00489                                         memcpypgm2ram(RAMStringBody, (ROM void*)"Armed by user:",14);
00490                                         strcat(RAMStringBody, UserID);
00491                                         SMTPClient.Body.szRAM = RAMStringBody;
00492                                 }
00493                                 else if (SMTPTaskList.Task[SMTPTaskList.CurentTask].SMTP_SendType == SMTP_Disarm) {
00494                                         SMTPClient.Subject.szROM = (ROM BYTE*)"System Disarmed";
00495                                         SMTPClient.ROMPointers.Subject = 1;
00496                                         memcpypgm2ram(RAMStringBody, (ROM void*)"Disarmed by user:",17);
00497                                         strcat(RAMStringBody, UserID);
00498                                         SMTPClient.Body.szRAM = RAMStringBody;
00499                                 }
00500 
00501                                 else if (SMTPTaskList.Task[SMTPTaskList.CurentTask].SMTP_SendType == SMTP_Alarmed) {
00502                                         SMTPClient.Subject.szROM = (ROM BYTE*)"Alarm has been triggered";
00503                                         SMTPClient.ROMPointers.Subject = 1;
00504                                         memcpypgm2ram(RAMStringBody, (ROM void*)"Zone number:",12);
00505                                         uitoa(LastZoneAlarmed,  DeviceDesc);
00506                                         strcat(RAMStringBody, DeviceDesc);
00507                                         memcpypgm2ram(RAMStringBody, (ROM void*)"\r\n",2);
00508 
00509                                         memcpypgm2ram(RAMStringBody, (ROM void*)"Zone description:",17);
00510                                         i2Count = DEVICEDESCLENGTH;
00511                                         if (LastZoneAlarmed != 0)
00512                                                 i2Count += (LastZoneAlarmed) * DEVICEDESCLENGTH + 1;
00513                                         XEEReadArray ((DWORD) i2Count, DeviceDesc , (BYTE) DEVICEDESCLENGTH);
00514                                         strncat(RAMStringBody, DeviceDesc, DEVICEDESCLENGTH);
00515                                         memcpypgm2ram(RAMStringBody, (ROM void*)"\r\n",2);
00516 
00517                                         SMTPClient.Body.szRAM = RAMStringBody;
00518                                 }
00519 
00520                                 else if (SMTPTaskList.Task[SMTPTaskList.CurentTask].SMTP_SendType == SMTP_Reset) {
00521                                         SMTPClient.Subject.szROM = (ROM BYTE*)"Device restarted";
00522                                         SMTPClient.ROMPointers.Subject = 1;
00523                                         SMTPClient.Body.szROM = (ROM BYTE*)"The device has been restarted. It is not known why. \r\nCurrently Disarmed";
00524                                         SMTPClient.ROMPointers.Body = 1;
00525 
00526                                 }
00527 
00528                                 else if (SMTPTaskList.Task[SMTPTaskList.CurentTask].SMTP_SendType == SMTP_InternetRestored) {
00529                                         SMTPClient.Subject.szROM = (ROM BYTE*)"Internet has been restored";
00530                                         SMTPClient.ROMPointers.Subject = 1;
00531                                         SMTPClient.Body.szROM = (ROM BYTE*)"Connection to the net was lost, it is back now.";
00532                                         SMTPClient.ROMPointers.Body = 1;
00533                                 }
00534 
00535                                 else {
00536                                         SMTPClient.Subject.szROM = (ROM BYTE*)"Internal error with SMTP";
00537                                         SMTPClient.ROMPointers.Subject = 1;
00538                                         SMTPClient.Body.szROM = (ROM BYTE*)"You are seeing this message because something is broken. Get Help!";
00539                                         SMTPClient.ROMPointers.Body = 1;
00540                                 }
00541 
00542 
00543                                 // inform the SMTP Stack that email is ready for consumption
00544                                 SMTPSendMail();
00545 
00546                                 // inc the task state
00547                                 SMTPTaskList.Task[SMTPTaskList.CurentTask].SMTP_State = SMTP_SM_Working;
00548 
00549                                 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00550                                         putrsUART((ROM char*)"email built\r\n");
00551                                 #endif
00552 
00553                         }
00554 
00555 
00556                         else {
00557                                 // Something went wrong
00558                                 SMTPTaskList.Task[SMTPTaskList.CurentTask].SMTP_State = SMTP_SM_Done;
00559                                 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00560                                         putrsUART((ROM char*)"email failed to start\r\n");
00561                                 #endif
00562 
00563                         }
00564                         break;
00565 
00566                 case SMTP_SM_Working:
00567                         if(!SMTPIsBusy()) {
00568 
00569                                 SMTPTaskList.Task[SMTPTaskList.CurentTask].SMTP_State = SMTP_SM_Done;
00570 
00571                                 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00572                                         putrsUART((ROM char*)"email completed\r\n");
00573                                 #endif
00574 
00575                                 ReturnResult = (int)SMTPEndUsage();
00576 
00577                                 SMPTTestResult = ReturnResult;
00578 
00579                                 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00580                                         putrsUART((ROM char*)"email Response code: ");
00581                                         ultoa (ReturnResult, TempString);
00582                                         putsUART(TempString);
00583                                         putrsUART((ROM char*)"\r\n");
00584                                 #endif
00585 
00586                         }///SMTPIsBusy
00587                         else {
00588                                 // Email in progress
00589 
00590                         }
00591 
00592                         break;
00593 
00594         } //switch
00595 
00596 
00597 #endif //#if defined(STACK_USE_SMTP_CLIENT)
00598 } //void SMTPTaskProcess(void)
00599 
00600 
00601 
00602 /*********************************************************************
00603   Function:        SMTPQueueEmail
00604   PreCondition:    none
00605   Input:           Email type
00606   Output:          None
00607   Side Effects:    None
00608   Overview:
00609 
00610  ********************************************************************/
00611 
00612  /// Places a new email in the SMTP queue to be processed (sent)
00613  void SMTPQueueEmail (SMTP_SendTypes Email_Type) {
00614 
00615         char TempString[3];
00616 
00617         // If emails are not active, drop out and do nothing
00618         if(xPLConfig.SMTP_Active == FALSE)
00619                 return;
00620 
00621         #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00622                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"Email placed in queue \r\n  - SMTP task position");
00623                 uitoa(SMTPTaskList.FreePosition,  TempString);
00624                 putsUART(TempString);
00625                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"\r\n");
00626         #endif
00627 
00628         SMTPTaskList.Task[SMTPTaskList.FreePosition].SMTP_SendType = Email_Type;
00629         SMTPTaskList.Task[SMTPTaskList.FreePosition].SMTP_State = SMTP_SM_InQ;
00630 
00631         // Increaments the Free position, ready for the next task.
00632         if (SMTPTaskList.FreePosition < (SMTPSMSIZE-1))
00633                 SMTPTaskList.FreePosition++;
00634         else if(SMTPTaskList.FreePosition >= (SMTPSMSIZE-1))
00635                 SMTPTaskList.FreePosition =0;
00636 
00637 
00638 } //SMTPQueueEmail
